thread.section_title: RI Student Loan Authority/College Planning Center of RI Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of RI Student Loan Authority/College Planning Center of RI | www.risla.com
thread.title: Donna D.
thread.title_full: RI Student Loan Authority/College Planning Center of RI reviewed by Donna D.

author: Donna D.
title: Donna D.
text: Without the help from the College Planning center, ,my life as the Mom of a very ambitious young man in college would have been MUCH more difficult! It was great to have the center to turn to with all of the help that they offer for free! It was easy to make an appointment and to get the answers I needed so many times! I just completed my last FAFSA review since my son will be a senior next year. So relieved and ready to move forward! College planning details can be very stressful, so I was grateful to have the help!
